project.title: NEON DIVIDE
project.subtitle: A Dystopian Love Story
project.inspiration: Romeo & Juliet reimagined in retro-futuristic cyberpunk world
project.tone: Dark, moody, retro-cyberpunk with bittersweet hope

narrative_summary: In a dystopian megacity divided by a glowing neon wall, Aria (corporate elite) and Kai (lower district rebel) meet in forbidden neutral ground. Their love defies faction borders, but discovery forces a heartbreaking sacrifice. Separated by the barrier, they maintain connection through a flickering holographic heart - a promise that love transcends physical division.

visual_style.characteristics: Film grain, analog warmth, neon-noir lighting, atmospheric haze, rain/steam effects, holographic UI elements, vintage CRT displays

aria.name: Aria
aria.appearance: Young East Asian woman, sleek black hair with blue highlights, subtle cybernetic temple enhancement
aria.wardrobe: White futuristic corporate blazer, silver accents, holographic ID badge

kai.name: Kai
kai.appearance: Rugged man, messy dark brown hair, light stubble, scar on left cheek, weathered hands
kai.wardrobe: Distressed brown leather jacket with tech patches, cargo pants, combat boots, analog watch

scenes.title: The Divided City
scenes.camera_movement: Slow forward dolly descending toward neon wall
scenes.narrative_purpose: Establish the divided world and visual contrast between factions

scenes.title: Her World
scenes.camera_movement: Slow push-in from medium to close-up
scenes.narrative_purpose: Introduce Aria's isolated privilege and yearning for something more

scenes.title: His World
key_visual_elements: Grated ceiling view to upper city
scenes.narrative_purpose: Introduce Kai's resourceful rebellion and determination to transcend barriers

scenes.title: The Meeting
scenes.camera_movement: Dual tracking shots converging to center
scenes.narrative_purpose: First meeting across the divide, fate and forbidden attraction

scenes.title: The Connection
scenes.camera_movement: Slow motion, shallow depth of field
scenes.narrative_purpose: Physical and digital connection forming, defiant love despite danger

scenes.title: The Chase
scenes.camera_movement: Fast tracking following runners from behind
scenes.narrative_purpose: Discovery and pursuit, rebellion against system, urgency and danger

scenes.title: The Sacrifice
key_visual_elements: Blue light (Aria side) vs amber (Kai side)
scenes.narrative_purpose: Heartbreaking sacrifice, separation despite love, tragic Romeo & Juliet moment

scenes.title: The Promise
scenes.camera_movement: Slow dolly back from close-ups to wide cityscape
key_visual_elements: Blue corporate office vs amber workshop
Floating holographic cyan heart in both spaces
scenes.narrative_purpose: Bittersweet ending, love transcending barriers, hope for eventual reunion, unfinished story inviting sequel
